title: EU AI Act Compliance Checker: Automated Legal Risk Assessment for Artificial Intelligence Systems
description: An automated web-based compliance system that evaluates AI applications against EU AI Act regulations. The system performs risk classification, validates regulatory obligations, and generates comprehensive compliance reports in PDF format. Built with FastAPI, Python, and YAML-based legal rules engine. This tool bridges AI engineering and regulatory governance, enabling organizations to develop AI systems responsibly and legally.

creators.name: Daakshayani N S
creators.affiliation: Sri Shakthi Institute of Engineering and Technology, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India

notes: This software was developed as part of a research project for admission to the Master's Programme in Artificial Intelligence & Society (Computational Social Sciences Track). The project demonstrates automated legal risk assessment capabilities and proposes frameworks for continuous, context-aware AI governance.
references: European Commission. (2021). Proposal for a Regulation on Artificial Intelligence (AI Act)
Veale, M., & Borgesius, F. Z. (2021). Demystifying the Draft EU Artificial Intelligence Act
